channel.title: Bad dc problem - helper gets owner on my server
channel.description:
Ok the problem is that when people & and go on my server say for like 5-10 mins right we stay on
But when we log off we cant get back on neither can other players, i have to restart the server so i can go bk on
[size=20pt]Please help me! IT WOULD REALLY REALLY BE APPRECIARED[/size]
Another server i play is the exact same but it doesnt dc people can play it..
HELP:(
THANKS ALOT!
Server Source: Zdiddy Reloaded
